Message: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying: I will try again tomorrow.
Author: Mary Anne Radmacher

Message: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
Author: Japanese Proverb

Message: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
Author: Albert Einstein

Message: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
Author: Thomas Edison

Message: Failure is only the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
Author: Henry Ford

Message: A failure is not always a mistake. It may simply be the best one can do under the circumstances. The real mistake is to stop trying.
Author: B.F. Skinner

Message: Ask yourself this question: Will this matter a year from now?
Author: Richard Carlson

Message: What if I told you that 10 years from now, your life would be exactly the same? I doubt you'd be happy. So, why are you so afraid of change?
Author: Karen Salmansohn

Message: As I look back on my life, I realize that every time I thought I was being rejected from something good, I was actually being redirected to something better.
Author: Dr. Steve Maraboli

Message: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Author: Robert Collier

Message: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
Author: Confucius

Message: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat.
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Message: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
Author: Newt Gingrich

Message: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
Author: Julie Andrews

Message: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Message: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
Author: William Feather

Message: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
Author: Dale Carnegie

Message: Failure is often that early morning hour of darkness which precedes the dawning of the day of success.
Author: Leigh Mitchell Hodges

Message: We will either find a way or make one.
Author: Hannibal

Message: It always seems impossible until it's done.
Author: Nelson Mandela

Message: The best way out is always through.
Author: Robert Frost

Message: A winner is just a loser who tried one more time.
Author: George M. Moore Jr.

Message: I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody.
Author: Bill Cosby

Message: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
Author: George Edward Woodberry

Message: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you ... never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

Message: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Author: Confucius

Message: I am a slow walker, but I never walk back.
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Message: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
Author: Babe Ruth

Message: Courage is not having the strength to go on; it is going on when you don't have the strength.
Author: Theodore Roosevelt

Message: Character consists of what you do on the third and fourth tries.
Author: James A. Michener

Message: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
Author: Walter Elliot

Message: The only courage that matters is the kind that gets you from one moment to the next.
Author: Mignon McLaughlin

Message: Let me tell you the secret that has led to my goal. My strength lies solely in my tenacity.
Author: Louis Pasteur

Message: I was taught the way of progress is neither swift nor easy.
Author: Marie Curie

Message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Author: Winston Churchill
